title: cultural_data_Antwerp_Museum_App
text:
﻿App Link on Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.ourjouwan.BeirutMuseum.
Application Name: Antwerp Museum App.
Number of Reviews: 237.00.
Application Description: The Antwerp Museum App is your trusted companion in and outside of Antwerp’s museums. Antwerp is a real treat for museum lovers. There’s an abundance of art and history to explore. The Antwerp Museum App is a fantastic upgrade of your visit to Antwerp’s museums. It is loaded with exclusive content and curated tours.Must see tours* Follow in the footsteps of the migrants who left for the United States during a city walk by the Red Star Line Museum* Meet Peter Paul Rubens in his home at the centre of Antwerp* Discover the highlights of Museum Mayer van den Bergh Museum in just 30 minutes* Let the authors Rachida Lamrabet, Kristien Hemmerechts or Tom Naegels guide you through the House of Literature* Take your (grand)children on a tour of the finest comic walls in the cityGood to know: New tours are added regularly so there is always something new to explore.Loads of advantages* All Antwerp museums in one app* Tours in the museums and in the city* Loads of photography, video and audio* Download tours for offline use* Also great fun for childrenThe Antwerp Museum App* features tours by: MAS | Museum aan de Stroom, Red Star Line Museum, Middelheim Museum, Fashion Museum (MoMu), Rubens House, Museum Plantin-Moretus, Museum Mayer van den Bergh, Museum Rockoxhuis, Vleeshuis Museum, Letterenhuis, Maagdenhuis Museum, Hendrik Conscience Heritage Library;* is available for tablet and smartphone; for Android and iOS;* is available in Dutch, English, French, German, Spanish and Italien* is freeEnjoy!More info at www.antwerpmuseumapp.com.
Number of Characters in Description: 1548.00.
Overall Rate: 4.20.
First Page Reviews: It indeed creates an atmosphere while walking through museums, churches etc. I not real like dis ap Brilliant Horrible, bloated, requires a ridiculous amount of permissions, unacceptable privacy policy. People rating this 5 stars are probably on the Antwerp payroll...
